metadata.description: Cap stars in this mini-series! Steve Rogers is a perpetually young, blond, blue-eyed Adonis with a level head, a good job and a bright future. He should be the happiest guy in the world, but he's not, and never has been. A warrior who's haunted by what he's seen and consumed by his life's mission, in vigilance, he's alone. Bruce Jones and Steve Rude ask what is the toll for these hard choices? What is the cost of a life spent with honor? What is the cost of heroism? What Price Glory?
metadata.name: Captain America: What Price Glory?
